pr_title: fix(GameProvider): prevent creating game with duplicate name

timeline.message: fix(new_game_name): Fix error with creating game, which have equals name as exists save

timeline.bodyText: isn't this check included in the next one?
timeline.author: skaldarnar

replies.bodyText: No.we already have "saved" game  in next test . there - not.
replies.author: DarkWeird

timeline.bodyText: What do you think of creating a method for this called mimicSaveGame(customSavesFolder, gameName)?
timeline.author: skaldarnar

timeline.bodyText: Why is this necessary? shouldn't this be covered by getNextGameName(gameName)?
timeline.author: skaldarnar

replies.bodyText:
Default name is "Game 1"
If move this it getNextGameName(gameName) then any custom gamenames will have suffix " 1"
replies.author: DarkWeird

timeline.bodyText: This prefix match and handling looks a bit shaky to me. We probably should define way more tests to define what we expect here...
timeline.author: skaldarnar
